//apple_ref/occ/intfm/PLVPaymentTaskDelegate/paymentTask:needsSignatureWithCompletionHandler: PLVPaymentTaskDelegate method for signature. This is called when a card requires signning The signature image has to be provided and the attendant has to compare the signature in the image with the signature on the card. PLVPaymentTask.h
- (void)paymentTask:(PLVPaymentTask *)paymentTask needsSignatureWithCompletionHandler:(void ( ^ ) ( BOOL confirmed , CGImageRef image ))completionHandler
paymentTask Payment task that needs a signature.
completionHandler A handler that your delegate method must call. The block takes two parameters: confirmed A Boolean value indicating if the signature has been confirmed or denied by an attendant. image Signature image. Must not be NULL.
//api/name/paymentTask:needsSignatureWithCompletionHandler:
//apple_ref/occ/intfm/PLVPaymentTaskDelegate/paymentTaskDidFinish: Called when payment task finishes. Check the result property for the result. PLVPaymentTask.h
- (void)paymentTaskDidFinish:(PLVPaymentTask *)paymentTask
paymentTask The finished payment task.
//api/name/paymentTaskDidFinish:
//apple_ref/occ/intfm/PLVPaymentTaskDelegate/paymentTask:didFailWithError: Called when payment task fails. PLVPaymentTask.h
- (void)paymentTask:(PLVPaymentTask *)paymentTask didFailWithError:(NSError *)error
paymentTask The failed payment task.
error Error object containing information about the failure.
